description: An organizational account for a service or a set of services (e.g. AWS, Okta, Bitbucket Team, Google G-Suite account, Apple Developer Account). Each Account should be connected to a Service.

accessURL.description: The main URL to access this account, e.g. https://jupiterone.okta.com

mfaEnabled.description: Specifies whether multi-factor authentication (MFA) is enabled/required for users of this account.
